org.waarp.ftp.core.utils

Class FtpTimerTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • org.waarp.ftp.core.utils.FtpTimerTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class FtpTimerTask
extends TimerTask
    Timer Task used mainly when the server is going to shutdown in order to be sure the program exit.
    Author:
    Frederic Bregier
